login.select_cookies: SELECT uid,cookies FROM spider_login WHERE uid = %s
login.update_cookies: UPDATE spider_login SET cookies= %s WHERE uid=%s

spider.select_weibo_user: SELECT weibo_id,screen_name FROM weibo_user WHERE weibo_id=%s
spider.update_weibo_user: INSERT INTO weibo_user (weibo_id,screen_name) VALUES (%s,%s)  ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE screen_name=%s
